abilities.name: Healing Growth
abilities.text: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, remove 4 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon. This power can't be used if Tangrowth is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Big Growth
attacks.text: Search your discard pile for as many Grass Energy cards as you like and attach them to your Pokémon in any way you like.
